All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Build
    Build a static site from a specified path.
    Clean
    Clean a static site.
    ConvertorForYaml
    Class to convert yaml file
    ConvertorToHtml
    Class to convert a markdown file to a html one
    Init
    Initialize a static site in a specified path.
    PageParser
    Class to parse the page.md
    Serve
    Serve the build result on a web browser.
    Statique
    Class for the static site
    Statique.AppVersionProvider
    Class to give the version of the site
    Utils
    Utilities needed for this project
    Watcher
    Class to watch a directory for changes
